data.eml:eml: Amerila (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae) of Cameroon with morphological remarks on male and female genitalia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Przybyłowicz, Łukasz, Maicher, Vincent, László, Gyula M., Sáfián, Szabolcs, Tropek, Robert (2019): Amerila (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae) of Cameroon with morphological remarks on male and female genitalia. Zootaxa 4674 (2): 283-295, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.2.8
